heisig_chinese_memo: Are area of soil where people stop by is what your address refers to.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Are area of soil where people stop by is what your address refers to.
humanum_short_description_en: The inscriptions from the earth to stop, stop like a toe, have the meaning of walking, like the shape of a person starting from a mound. The meaning of the oracle bone inscription is unknown, and the inscription is used as the clan emblem. "Shuowen": "Address, Jiye. Stop sound from ğ¨¸ (press: Fu). Address, address or Congtu." According to "Shuowen", " site " is the or body of " site ", see " site " ".
